input.sentences: the photographer loved taking pictures of his friends | but his friends did n't always love it .
he took pictures of people | and everything he could .
his girlfriend and him loved traveling the city | seeing everything they could .
his father did n't mind him taking pictures of him | he 'd been doing it since he was young .
at the end of the day | the photographer just loved taking pictures .
output.sentences: Her goal was to take pictures of everyone in the town.
Some people tried to hide from her camera.
She took pictures of herself in some of the pictures.
Her dad wasn't fond of her hobby.
She tried to take pictures of groups of people too.
